title: Stepping Down & Stepping Up
description:
Pablo Torre, Sarah Spain and Israel Gutierrez debate what they take away from the news that Bruce Arians is stepping down as coach of the Bucs and if the Heat’s victory over the Celtics last night changes their opinion about either team.

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): What Do You Take Away From The Bucs' Coaching Change?
